[
    InlineHtml(
        "<h1>\n    ",
    ),
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 2,
            column: 5,
            position: 9,
        },
    ),
    Echo {
        echo: Span {
            line: 2,
            column: 11,
            position: 15,
        },
        values: [
            Literal(
                String(
                    LiteralString {
                        value: ""Hello, world!"",
                        span: Span {
                            line: 2,
                            column: 16,
                            position: 20,
                        },
                    },
                ),
            ),
        ],
        ending: CloseTag(
            Span {
                line: 2,
                column: 32,
                position: 36,
            },
        ),
    },
    InlineHtml(
        "\n</h1>",
    ),
]
